def construct_roads(n, t, k, a):
    b = [0 for _ in range(t)]
    b[t - 1] = a[t - 1]
    maxk = a[t - 1]
    for i in range(t - 2, -1, -1):
        b[i] = b[i + 1]
        if a[i + 1] < a[i]:
            b[i] += a[i] - a[i + 1]
        maxk -= a[i] - 1
    if b[0] > k or maxk < k:
        return -1
    roads = []
    curr = 2
    for _ in range(a[0]):
        roads.append((1, curr))
        curr += 1
    for lvl in range(t - 1):
        childless = min(a[lvl] - 1, k - b[lvl + 1])
        parent = curr - 1
        for _ in range(a[lvl] - childless):
            roads.append((parent, curr))
            curr += 1
            parent -= 1
        parent += 1
        for _ in range(a[lvl + 1] - (a[lvl] - childless)):
            roads.append((parent, curr))
            curr += 1
        k -= childless
    return roads
